products.title: Basic Starter Pack
products.description: That’s the main thing people are controlled by! Thoughts- their perception of themselves!
products.full_description: The Basic Starter Pack allows you to fully express your vibrant personality with four grayscale options. Feeling adventurous? Put on a heather gray shirt. Want to be a trendsetter? Try our exclusive colorway: `Orange`. Need to add an extra pop of color to your outfit? Our white shirt has you covered.
products.details: The Stater pack includes 2 black, 2 white, and 2 heather gray Basic Shirts. Sign up for our subscription service and be the first to get new, exciting colors, like our upcoming `Charcoal Gray` limited release.

data.Features: The time is now for it to be okay to be great. People in this world shun people for being great. For being a bright color. For standing out. But the time is now to be okay to be the greatest you.
data.Care: It really matters and then like it really doesn`t matter. What matters is the people who are sparked by it. And the people who are like offended by it, it doesn`t matter. Because it's about motivating the doers. Because I`m here to follow my dreams and inspire other people to follow their dreams, too.
data.Shipping: The time is now for it to be okay to be great. People in this world shun people for being great. For being a bright color. For standing out. But the time is now to be okay to be the greatest you. Would you believe in what you believe in, if you were the only one who believed it?
data.Returns: I always felt like I could do anything. That`s the main thing people are controlled by! Thoughts- their perception of themselves! They're slowed down by their perception of themselves. If you're taught you can`t do anything, you won`t do anything. I was taught I could do everything.

products.title: iMac
products.description: There’s nothing I really wanted to do in life that I wasn’t able to get good at. That’s my skill. I’m not really specifically talented

data.Design: If everything I did failed - which it doesn't, it actually succeeds - just the fact that I'm willing to fail is an inspiration. People are so scared to lose that they don't even try. Like, one thing people can't say is that I'm not trying, and I'm not trying my hardest, and I'm not trying to do the best way I know how.
data.Material: The time is now for it to be okay to be great. People in this world shun people for being great. For being a bright color. For standing out. But the time is now to be okay to be the greatest you. Would you believe in what you believe in, if you were the only one who believed it? People are so scared to lose that they don't even try.
data.Considerations: I always felt like I could do anything. That’s the main thing people are controlled by! Thoughts- their perception of themselves! They're slowed down by their perception of themselves. If you're taught you can’t do anything, you won’t do anything. I was taught I could do everything.
data.Included: We’re not always in the position that we want to be at. We’re constantly growing. We’re constantly making mistakes. We’re constantly trying to express ourselves and actualize our dreams. If you have the opportunity to play this game of life you need to appreciate every moment. A lot of people don’t appreciate the moment until it’s passed.

reviews.name: Hector Gibbs
reviews.comment: As we live, our hearts turn colder. Cause pain is what we go through as we become older. We get insulted by others, lose trust for those others. We get back stabbed by friends.

reviews.name: Willie Manson
reviews.comment: It really matters and then like it really doesn’t matter. What matters is the people who are sparked by it. And the people who are like offended by it, it doesn’t matter.

reviews.name: Mary Doyle
reviews.comment: It really matters and then like it really doesn’t matter. What matters is the people who are sparked by it. And the people who are like offended by it, it doesn’t matter.

reviews.name: Joe Molly
reviews.comment: It’s like a little kid, a little boy, looking at colors, and no one told him what colors are good, before somebody tells you you shouldn’t like pink.

reviews.name: Keisha Megan
reviews.comment: For standing out. But the time is now to be okay to be the greatest you. Would you believe in what you believe in, if you were the only one who believed it?

reviews.name: Kevin Klein
reviews.comment: Society has put up so many boundaries, so many limitations on what’s right and wrong that it’s almost impossible to get a pure thought out.

testimonials.text: This headset is amazing! The picture quality is stunning and the tracking is super smooth. I've tried other headsets before, but this one blows them all out of the water. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

I was a bit hesitant to buy a VR headset, but I'm so glad I did. It's completely changed the way I play games and experience entertainment. This headset is comfortable to wear for long periods of time and the visuals are incredible. Definitely recommend it to anyone considering a VR headset!

I had some issues with the shipping, but the customer service team was incredibly helpful and resolved my problem quickly. The headset itself is fantastic - it's easy to set up and provides an immersive virtual reality experience. I'm really happy with my purchase and with the level of customer service I received!

about.title: About us
about.mission: Our mission is to provide cutting-edge virtual reality technology and accessories to our customers, enhancing their entertainment experiences and bringing them closer to their passions and hobbies.

values.Innovation: We are dedicated to staying at the forefront of the virtual reality industry, constantly seeking out new and innovative products and technologies to bring to our customers.
values.Quality: We are committed to providing the highest quality virtual reality products, ensuring that our customers have the best possible experience.
values.Accessibility: We believe that everyone should have access to the latest virtual reality technology, and work to provide affordable options for all.
values.Sustainability: We are committed to minimizing our environmental impact and promoting sustainable practices, from our packaging materials to our energy consumption.
